Module it.polimi.ingsw.progetto
Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.controller.clientstate

Class GameState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.controller.clientstate.GameState
public class GameState extends Object
The class represents the current state of the game
